description:
Custom Rich Presence (playing status) manager for Discord. Features run on startup and minimizing to tray.


Changes:
- Fixed a crash that could happen after a previous crash if you never connected in the app.
- Added new language: Lao (thanks to emjay.la).
- Updated Bulgarian, Greek (new translator, Areti), Hindi, Japanese (new translator, mititt), Dutch (new translator, Vince C.), Panjabi, Vietnamese.
.exe will install the program to %appdata%\CustomRP; .zip is a portable version of the program.
AppVeyor Build 185
